parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Index of one repeating element in this sketch-driven component pattern feature (see Remarks )

title: ILocalCurvePatternFeatureData.GetTransform
description: Gets the transform for the specified instance in this curve-driven component pattern feature.

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Index of one repeating element in this sketch-driven component pattern feature (see Remarks )

remarks:
Valid values for Instance are 1 <= Instance <=
ILocalCurvePatternFeatureData::GetPatternComponentCount
.
